name: 格雷格·布瑞克 Greg Bryk
intro: Greg Bryk was born in 1972 in Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada. He is an actor, known for A History of Violence (2005), The Incredible Hulk (2008) and Shoot 'Em Up (2007). He has been married to Danielle Nicholas since March 9, 1996. They have three children.
birthplace: 加拿大，马尼托巴，温尼伯市
